name: Light Keeper (Driller99)
description:
Project made in 1 week for the Brackey's Game Jam.

You're the last hope for the Earth.

 An alien army is trying to turn off the Sun to let  Earth without light and warm.

 Use your space ship equipped with laser guns, force shield and hydrobombs to stop them and give the humanity hope.

Controls:

WASD - Arrows  / For movement

L / Laser gun

M / Hydrobomb

K / Shield

The project was made with Unity 2018 by our little group Tools Studios. We are a group of  proggramers, so we have to struggle with the art and music making.

Members:
